actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize payment to be made for psychologist services provided by, or under arrangements made by, a hospice program.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to include psychologists' services within the definition of hospice care.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize payment to be made for psychologist services provided by, or under arrangements made by, a hospice program.
